snippet.title: The Last Remnant Remastered - Launch Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
The Last Remnant captured the hearts and minds of gamers with its enthralling story, countless characters and intricate battle system. Join Rush and his unlikely band of friends as they discover the Remnants and find a way to rescue his sister, Irina. It’s a timeless cult classic story available for the first time on PS4. Play now for $19.99 – also includes free PS4 theme!

Rated Mature: Blood, Language, Suggestive Themes, Violence
